div.p: Nancy: ... so it all seems fairly straightforward. I think we can definitely start meeting the 80-day goal.
Tracy: Oh, thank you, this sounds great. Let me just recap:
Tracy: so, you identified the key steps in the 80-day Federal hiring process.
Tracy: you identified key decisions you should make before posting the job vacancy, and
Tracy: you identified strategies for avoiding obstacles in the hiring process.
Tracy: Excellent work today. Thank you.
